plot: An intimate look at Wolf Creek Habitat, a wolf sanctuary in central Indiana. The short piece brings up the topic of wolf conservation and the plight of the wild wolf.
title: The Ambassadors
plot_es: An intimate look at Wolf Creek Habitat, a wolf sanctuary in central Indiana. The short piece brings up the topic of wolf conservation and the plight of the wild wolf.
plot_en: An intimate look at Wolf Creek Habitat, a wolf sanctuary in central Indiana. The short piece brings up the topic of wolf conservation and the plight of the wild wolf.
